an2.100:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these two kinds of fools. What two? One who perceives what is unallowable as allowable and one who perceives what is allowable as unallowable.[n.3]Yo ca akappiye kappiyasaññī, yo ca kappiye akappiyasaññī. This refers to what is allowable and not allowable according to the rules of monastic discipline.These are the two kinds of fools."
